summary: The Contoso Wireless phone is a powerful device that comes with a 5.5 inch HD display, 12MP rear camera, 8MP front camera, 4GB of RAM, 64GB of internal storage and a 3,000mAh battery. It also supports wireless charging and has a fingerprint scanner for added security. It comes with all the latest Google apps pre-installed, as well as some special Contoso apps designed to enhance the user experience. It has a one-year limited warranty and costs $599 USD. Special discounts and promotions are available from time to time.
